Class XmlRestfulContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context.impl.XmlRestfulContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RestfulContext

    public class XmlRestfulContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements RestfulContext

    Implementation of RestfulContext containing RESTful web service configuration information.

      • getConnectionTimeout

        public int getConnectionTimeout()
        Description copied from interface: RestfulContext
        Retrieves the configured connection timeout in milliseconds. This is the timeout used until a connection is established with the web service.

      • setConnectionTimeout

        public void setConnectionTimeout(int connectionTimeout)
        Description copied from interface: RestfulContext
        Sets the connection timeout. This is the timeout used, in milliseconds, until a connection is established with the web service. The default value is zero.
        Specified by:
        setConnectionTimeout in interface RestfulContext
        Parameters:
        connectionTimeout - the connection timeout to set

      • getResponseTimeout

        public int getResponseTimeout()
        Description copied from interface: RestfulContext
        Retrieves the configured response timeout in milliseconds. This is the timeout for waiting for data from the web service. A timeout of zero is interpreted as an infinite timeout.
        Specified by:
        getResponseTimeout in interface RestfulContext
        Returns:
        response timeout in milliseconds

      • setResponseTimeout

        public void setResponseTimeout(int responseTimeout)
        Description copied from interface: RestfulContext

        Specified by:
        setResponseTimeout in interface RestfulContext
        Parameters:
        responseTimeout - the response timeout in milliseconds
